name: Shell Team Aviation
about: Shell Team Aviation, while not a standalone flying school, is closely associated with aviation training through its partnerships and support. Located in Hamburg, Germany, Air Hamburg/Flying School Hamburg, a Shell Aviation partner, has been training pilots since 1992. With nearly 100 flight students annually, the school utilizes AeroShell products and provides comprehensive training in a fleet of 23 aircraft. The school offers maintenance services and operates scheduled and charter flights to various destinations. Shell's involvement includes providing AeroShell products and educational resources, such as the AeroShell Answer Book, to support the training of future pilots. This partnership ensures high-quality training and prepares students for successful careers in aviation. Shell Team Aviation's commitment to excellence in flight training and aviation services makes it a trusted name in the industry.
